Name: Pejes Vs Zombies
About the game: Pejes vs Zombies! a game where you can help the president of Mexico to fight against COVID - 99 Infected zombies! choose among several cartooned Mexican characters and fight for your survival. you are being attacked by the Pejes Zombies on multiple waves, and you have to survive alone or with your friends! there are multiple weapons and power ups! and the levels are very funny! the first level is Pueblo bonito , where you will find a very Mexican styled city. the second level is the 'Casa Blanca' a level you will find familiar if you are up to date with the news! the last level is the abandoned refinery. every level is unique and all the characters have their own personality. PEJES VS ZOMBIES IS A WORK IN PROGRESS WITH CONSTANT UPDATES, THE IMAGES SEEN CAN BE VERY DIFFERENT FROM THE USER EXPERIENCE
